title: OpenFAST Service
description: Use the OpenFAST service to model a wind turbine with BEM theory

children.purpose: A service that runs turbulence simulations.

datasets.purpose: A dataset containing a single TurbSim.inp file.
A dataset containing just the main OpenFAST file.
A dataset containing the files to run elastodyn.
A dataset containing the files to run beamdyn.
A dataset containing the files to run inflow.
A dataset containing the files to run aerodyn.
A dataset containing the files to run servodyn
A dataset containing the files to run subdyn.
A dataset containing the openfast output files.
